title: Pedro's Burro
description: Pedro's village has many burros that help their owners with work. Pedro wants a burro of his own, so Grandfather gives him one. Grandfather expects Pedro to use the burro to help with his chores, but Pedro has a different plan. Students will enjoy the bright and detailed illustrations as they read this sweet story.
